LanguageData.Arrow_Short.label: shortbow arrow
LanguageData.Bow_Short.label: short bow
LanguageData.Bow_Short.description: A simple short bow, made with skill, but using only the most primitive technologies.
LanguageData.Pilum_Thrown.label: pilum (thrown)
LanguageData.Pila.label: pila
LanguageData.Pila.description: A bundle of pila, non-reusable throwing spears.
LanguageData.Arrow_Great.label: greatbow arrow
LanguageData.Bow_Great.label: great bow
LanguageData.Bow_Great.description: A powerful greatbow. Fires a heavy arrow long distances.
